import React, {useState,useEffect} from 'react' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,InputGroup,Button,Dropdown,DropdownButton} from 'react-bootstrap' import axios from "axios"; function Admin() { const instance = axios.create({ baseURL: 'http://localhost:3000/admin' }); const [selected,setSelected]=useState('Usuario') const [cursos,setCursos]=useState([]) const [asignaturas,setAsignaturas]=useState([]) const [estudiantes,setEstudiantes]=useState([]) const [rut,setRut]=useState(""); const [pass,setPass]=useState(""); const [selectedCurso,setSelectedCurso]=useState(""); const handleSelect = (e) =>{ setSelected(e) } const handleSelectCurso = (e) =>{ setSelectedCurso(e) } useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { try { const response = await instance.get("/"); const response1 = await instance.get("/a"); const response2 = await instance.get("/e"); setCursos(response.data); setAsignaturas(response1.data); setEstudiantes(response2.data); } catch (err) {} }; fetchData(); }, []); return (
Rut Estudiante Profesor Apoderado {(() => { switch (selected) { case 'Estudiante': return(
Contraseña Curso {cursos.map(curso =>{ return( ) })} Registrado
) case 'Profesor': return(
Contraseña Asignatura {asignaturas.map(asignatura =>{ return( ) })} Curso {cursos.map(curso =>{ return( ) })} Registrado Profesor Jefe
) case "Apoderado": return(
Contraseña Registrado id Pupilo {estudiantes.map(estudiante =>{ return( ) })}
) }; })()}
2 of 2 1 of 3 3 of 3
) } export default Admin
